attributes.action: Agree to the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thios petition is for all the people who agree with the proposed government vehicle tracking scheme, so there is a change for those who want this scheme have got a petition to sign,  so we can see if there is anybody wishing to bring this system in, instead of it just being pushed through by the government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
